title: I never got my mystery skin!!
body: Hey Riot, after the Pool Party event, everyone who connected to league with facebook got a mystery skin and I thought I read that people who own all champ will recieve a mystery skin. It's been a week and I haven't got mine :(. I connected with facebook so I don't get why. Please help me {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Were you connected for all of June 28th, or have a restriction/ban?

Pretty sure that was only for the Pool Party Icon.

Anyone was able to get the mystery champ or skin(if you had 10 or less champ to purchase.)

I know it was under the icon section, but the individual rules for a mystery gift are that you can't be banned or suspended (including Leaver Buster), so probably applied if he was banned during the distribution.

Everyone, but there’s a little fine print:

For the Pool Party icon and Pool Party Mundo, you’ll need to contribute points during Team Up Week.

For the Mystery Champion, you’ll need to connect League and Facebook.
 
For negative players who won’t unlock Pool Party Mundo or the Pool Party icon we took a look at an accounts recent history (February to now) with LeaverBuster, bans, and chat and ranked restrictions to make the call. We expect the vast majority of players to be eligible for the rewards.

This is right from the FAQ of the Pool Party Event page. Mystery Champ had no restrictions on it except for connecting it at a proper time for at least 24 hours.

Those aren't all the rules...all of the rules normally associated with mystery gifting applied; as in, they need to have 10+ eligible champions left, and if not, have 10+ eligible skins left. They even had to elaborate on this outside of the pool party FAQ.
Aaaand if you had less than both, you get RP. :P

It appears that all gift have been distributed as of yesterday, July 7th. 

If you didn't receive a gift, and you believe you should have, please feel free to submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new).
I believe if you have been negative in the past weeks you won't receive the free gift..

They're still being distributed last I heard.

If you want, you can submit a ticket to Riot Support regarding the issue. They would be able to help you a lot more than we can.

Were you connected by the proper date for at least 24 hours?

"Make sure to connect from 11:59 PM PDT on 6/28 through 11:59 PM PDT on 6/29, otherwise you may not receive your Mystery Champion as expected."

If not, that could be the reason why you did not get one.

well yea I had been connected for way before this event even started but w/e atleast I know other people got it so that's not cause they didn'T give. I srsly don,T know what happened though since I never got banned or any kind of restrictions exept like a warning cause I dced a game when my internet bugged xD.
Only Riot has then answers then. I would submit a ticket about it and see what you get for a response.
